name: minne
description: Minne is a simple self-hosted budgeting tool designed for personal finance tracking. It supports categories, transaction entry, and charts, with a fully responsive and clean user interface.
features: Budget Tracking: Monitor income and expenses with customizable budget categories and spending limits.
Transaction Entry: Quick and easy transaction logging with automatic categorization and duplicate detection.
Visual Charts: View spending patterns and budget performance with interactive charts and graphs.
Category Management: Create custom expense categories with color coding and spending limit alerts.
Monthly Reports: Generate detailed financial reports showing income, expenses, and savings trends.
Goal Setting: Set financial goals and track progress with visual indicators and milestone notifications.
Responsive Design: Clean, mobile-friendly interface that works seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes.
Data Privacy: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over sensitive financial information.
Import Tools: Import transactions from bank statements and CSV files for easy data migration.
Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic recurring income and expense entries for regular payments.
Search and Filter: Find transactions quickly using date ranges, categories, and amount filters.
Backup Export: Export financial data for backup purposes and integration with external accounting tools.
